verses.text: \w A|strong="H8085"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* heareth \w the|strong="H8085"\w* doctrine \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* scorner, beareth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* reproved.

\w Of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* filled \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* things: \w but|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* transgressors \w is|strong="H0376"\w* wicked.

\w He|strong="H6310"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* keepeth \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, keepeth \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: \w but|strong="H8193"\w* \w he|strong="H6310"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* hath no \w guard|strong="H8104"\w* \w on|strong="H6310"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w speech|strong="H8193"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* meet \w with|strong="H6310"\w* evils.

\w The|strong="H0369"\w* \w sluggard|strong="H6102"\w* willeth \w and|strong="H5315"\w* willeth \w not|strong="H0369"\w*: \w but|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H0369"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H5315"\w* them \w that|strong="H5315"\w* work, \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w made|strong="H1878"\w* \w fat|strong="H1878"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1697"\w* \w just|strong="H1697"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w a|strong="H1697"\w* \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*: \w but|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* confoundeth, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w confounded|strong="H2659"\w*.

\w Justice|strong="H6666"\w* keepeth \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w innocent|strong="H6666"\w*: \w but|strong="H1870"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7564"\w* overthroweth \w the|strong="H1870"\w* sinner.

\w One|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* as \w it|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H0369"\w* \w rich|strong="H6238"\w*, when \w he|strong="H3426"\w* hath \w nothing|strong="H0369"\w*: \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w another|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* as \w it|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H0369"\w* \w poor|strong="H7326"\w*, when \w he|strong="H3426"\w* hath \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w riches|strong="H1952"\w*.

\w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w ransom|strong="H3724"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* \w manâ€™s|strong="H0376"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* beareth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* reprehension.

\w The|strong="H8055"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \w of|strong="H0216"\w* \w the|strong="H8055"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* giveth \w joy|strong="H8055"\w*: \w but|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H8055"\w* \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w* \w of|strong="H0216"\w* \w the|strong="H8055"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w be|strong="H7563"\w* \w put|strong="H1846"\w* \w out|strong="H1846"\w*.

\w Among|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* proud there are \w always|strong="H7535"\w* contentions: \w but|strong="H7535"\w* \w they|strong="H3289"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* do all things \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w*, are ruled \w by|strong="H5414"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.

\w Substance|strong="H1952"\w* got \w in|strong="H5921"\w* haste \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w diminished|strong="H4591"\w*: \w but|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3027"\w* which \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w little|strong="H4591"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w little|strong="H4591"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w increase|strong="H7235"\w*.

\w Hope|strong="H8431"\w* \w that|strong="H0935"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w deferred|strong="H4900"\w* afflicteth \w the|strong="H0935"\w* soul: \w desire|strong="H8378"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H0935"\w* cometh \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.

Whosoever speaketh ill \w of|strong="H1697"\w* any \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, bindeth \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w for|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* time \w to|strong="H1697"\w* come: \w but|strong="H4687"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* feareth \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w*, \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H1697"\w* peace. Deceitful souls go astray \w in|strong="H1697"\w* sins: \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w just|strong="H1697"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* merciful, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* shew mercy.

\w The|strong="H5493"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H8451"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w is|strong="H8451"\w* a \w fountain|strong="H4726"\w* \w of|strong="H8451"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, that \w he|strong="H4194"\w* may decline \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* ruin \w of|strong="H8451"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

\w Good|strong="H2896"\w* instruction shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w*: \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* scorners \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* deep pit.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w prudent|strong="H6175"\w* mall doth \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* counsel: \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H6566"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w*, layeth open \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w folly|strong="H0200"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5307"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H4397"\w* \w the|strong="H5307"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w into|strong="H5307"\w* mischief: \w but|strong="H7563"\w* \w a|strong="H5307"\w* \w faithful|strong="H0529"\w* ambassador \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w health|strong="H4832"\w*.

\w Poverty|strong="H7389"\w* \w and|strong="H8104"\w* \w shame|strong="H7036"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w him|strong="H4148"\w* that refuseth \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*: \w but|strong="H3513"\w* he that yieldeth \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w reproof|strong="H8433"\w*, shall be \w glorified|strong="H3513"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1961"\w* \w desire|strong="H8378"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* accomplished, delighteth \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* \w hate|strong="H8441"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* flee \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w things|strong="H8441"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H1980"\w* walketh \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, shall be \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*: \w a|strong="H1980"\w* friend \w of|strong="H2450"\w* \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* shall \w become|strong="H1980"\w* \w like|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H0854"\w*.

\w Evil|strong="H7451"\w* pursueth \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w*: \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H6662"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* shall \w be|strong="H6662"\w* repaid.

\w The|strong="H2398"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w man|strong="H6662"\w* leaveth heirs, \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w grandsons|strong="H1121"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H2398"\w* \w substance|strong="H2428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H2398"\w* \w sinner|strong="H2398"\w* \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w kept|strong="H6845"\w* \w for|strong="H2428"\w* \w the|strong="H2398"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w*.

\w Much|strong="H7230"\w* \w food|strong="H0400"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* tillage \w of|strong="H7230"\w* fathers: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* others \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* gathered \w with|strong="H4941"\w* out \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0157"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* spareth \w the|strong="H0157"\w* \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* hateth \w his|strong="H2820"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*: but \w he|strong="H0157"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* loveth \w him|strong="H8130"\w* correcteth \w him|strong="H8130"\w* betimes.

\w The|strong="H0398"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* eateth \w and|strong="H0398"\w* filleth \w his|strong="H0398"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: \w but|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* never \w to|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* filled.
